title: GuTiRo
author: GuTiRo
content: We have launched a forum with the aim of creating a community for everyone, from newbies to veterans in the cryptocurrency industry.Also, to motivate all users to participate in the discussions, airdrops will be given periodically and the most active users will be rewarded.www.modden.ioHope to see you there!

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Checking the about us it says QuoteOur community has been around for many years and pride ourselves on offering unbiased, critical discussion among people of all different backgrounds. We are working every day to make sure our community is one of the best.Can you clarify this, you just launch a new forum but you claimed to be around for many years, how many years and what year did you start what is your achievement over the years and how will you reward your members, is it an airdrop based or pay per post forum, you should clarify this to us.

comments.author: MiningCoinsPool
comments.body: Quote from: GuTiRo on July 16, 2022, 10:21:10 AMWe have launched a forum with the aim of creating a community for everyone, from newbies to veterans in the cryptocurrency industry.Also, to motivate all users to participate in the discussions, airdrops will be given periodically and the most active users will be rewarded.www.modden.ioHope to see you there!Awesome good job guys! looks great

comments.author: GuTiRo
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on July 16, 2022, 01:43:23 PMChecking the about us it says QuoteOur community has been around for many years and pride ourselves on offering unbiased, critical discussion among people of all different backgrounds. We are working every day to make sure our community is one of the best.Can you clarify this, you just launch a new forum but you claimed to be around for many years, how many years and what year did you start what is your achievement over the years and how will you reward your members, is it an airdrop based or pay per post forum, you should clarify this to us.We have been in multiple forums before, but this is the first time we will own it and we are looking to bring people and grow a community. To achieve that, we have also launched a PoS coin called Modden which will be used as a reward in the forum.There will be multiple ways of getting those rewards, such as weekly and month events, airdrops or even getting to the top of the ranking in the forum through participating in discussions or receiving likes from other users.
